ValidationRule.description: Enforces State Rules for SAPCRM integration
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IsPersonAccount && (( PersonMailingCountry = 'AU' && NOT(ISBLANK(PersonMailingState)) && NOT(CONTAINS('AAT,ACT,NSW,NT,QLD,SA,TAS,VIC,WA', PersonMailingState)) ) || ( PersonOtherCountry = 'AU' && NOT(ISBLANK(PersonOtherState)) && NOT(CONTAINS('AAT,ACT,NSW,NT,QLD,SA,TAS,VIC,WA', PersonOtherState)) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The State entered is not valid for Australia. Please enter a valid state in this format. 'AAT', 'ACT','NSW', 'NT','QLD','SA','TAS','VIC', 'WA'. This is to ensure SAP-CRM Integration can be supported.
